thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 14 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Telstra Corporation Says HY Profit For Period Attributable $1.70 Bln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Telstra Corporation Says HY Profit For Period Attributable $1.70 Bln

organizations.name: brief-telstra corporation says hy profit for period attributable

text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Telstra Corporation Ltd:
* HY TOTAL INCOME $14.51 BILLION, UP 5.9 PERCENT * HY PROFIT FOR PERIOD ATTRIBUTABLE TO EQUITY HOLDERS OF TELSTRA ENTITY $1,703 MILLION VERSUS $1,791 MILLION
* TOTAL INTERIM DIVIDEND 11.0 CENTS PER SHARE * HY REVENUE (EXCLUDING FINANCE INCOME) FROM ORDINARY ACTIVITIES $12.91 BILLION, UP 0.8 PERCENT
* TOTAL INTERIM DIVIDEND COMPRISES INTERIM ORDINARY DIVIDEND 7.5 CENTS PER SHARE & INTERIM SPECIAL DIVIDEND 3.5 CENTS PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
